title: Function and Derivative Comparison
description: Interactive side-by-side visualization showing a function and its derivative with synchronized point, tangent line, and value displays. Students explore how the tangent line slope equals the derivative value, building intuition for the fundamental relationship between functions and their rates of change.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Tangent Lines
Rate of Change
Function Analysis

controls.description: Shows or hides the tangent line
